Description of incident: "We are writing to let you know about an incident involving your personal information. On September 24th, Cindi Phillips' office was broken into and two computers were stolen.  The computers stored files which included your personal information. The information included your name, marital status, employer information, net worth, home phone number, E-mail address, cell phone number, address, and Social Security Number. The police have been notified of this incident."More Information: http://www.dfr.vermont.gov/sites/default/files/11_12_2015%20Capital%20Fi...
